description: Petofy helps you find and adopt pets from shelters and rescues. Browse through our adoption listings to find your new best friend.

faqs.question: How can I adopt a pet through Petofy?
faqs.answer: Visit our adoption section, browse available pets, and contact the shelter or rescue listed for the adoption process.

faqs.question: What are the requirements for adopting a pet?
faqs.answer: Requirements vary by shelter, but generally include providing a safe and loving home, and sometimes a home visit or interview.

faqs.question: Can I meet the pet before adoption?
faqs.answer: Yes, Petofy encourages potential adopters to meet the pets in person to ensure a good match.

additional_info.title: Adoption Events
additional_info.details: Petofy organizes regular adoption events where you can meet multiple pets available for adoption.

additional_info.title: Support for New Pet Owners
additional_info.details: We offer resources and support to help new pet owners with the transition and care of their adopted pets.
